levels.name: A1 - Beginner
levels.description: Can understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases.

levels.name: A2 - Elementary
levels.description: Can communicate in simple and routine tasks requiring a simple and direct exchange of information.

levels.name: B1 - Intermediate
levels.description: Can deal with most situations likely to arise while travelling in an area where the language is spoken.

levels.name: B2 - Upper Intermediate
levels.description: Can interact with a degree of fluency and spontaneity that makes regular interaction with native speakers quite possible.

levels.name: C1 - Advanced
levels.description: Can express ideas fluently and spontaneously without much obvious searching for expressions.

levels.name: C2 - Mastery
levels.description: Can understand with ease virtually everything heard or read.
